home.introduction: I am a Full Stack developer specializing in Java and Angular, passionate about creating innovative software solutions.

card.text1: Second year of master's degree training.
card.text2: First year of master's degree training.
card.text3: Third year of undergraduate training in Software Engineering and Database. (With honors)

card1.dataP: Creation of dynamic and responsive websites using Angular for the frontend and Java (Spring Boot) or JavaEE for the backend.

card2.dataP: Design and development of robust and secure RESTful APIs in Java to enable communication between different applications and services.

card3.dataP: Modernization of existing architectures to improve scalability and maintainability.
